projects.title: Samoth
projects.desc: Designed and developed a portfolio website built for Samoth, a creative media collective created to provide young passionate creatives a platform to exercise their niches in an organized, collaborative environment.

projects.title: Finder
projects.desc: Designed and frontend developed with an 4 other students to produce and deploy Finder (FIN-dur), a secure web application designed to safely match lost items, found around the RPI campus, with the descriptions submitted by those who have lost them, providing RPI students, faculty and staff a quick and effective online lost and found service.

projects.title: HACKRPI X
projects.desc: Designed and developed components of the HACKRPI 2023 (HACKRPI X) web application as Team Lead of the Rensselaer Center for Open Source HACKRPI Website Development Team.
